dashboard.label: Audit Dashboards
dashboard.description: Check which dashboards are compliant with company guidelines
dashboard.definition:
{"visualizations":{"viz_Q1B0WgjB":{"type":"splunk.table","title":"Dashboards By User","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_xMTSDOeg"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.setToken","options":{"tokens":[{"token":"user","key":"row.author.value"}]}}]},"viz_GrDdPZ2a":{"type":"splunk.pie","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_dDqwzGi2"},"title":"$user$ Compliant With Banner","options":{"labelDisplay":"valuesAndPercentage"}},"viz_2IpcmZKQ":{"type":"splunk.pie","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_FabYWQrE"},"title":"$user$ Compliant With Dashboard Description","options":{"labelDisplay":"valuesAndPercentage"}},"viz_vP681bAk":{"type":"splunk.table","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_CnSLL1db"},"title":"Dashboards Without Banner","eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.linkToDashboard","options":{"app":"lame_documentation","dashboard":"about_this_dashboard","newTab":true,"tokens":[{"token":"id","value":"row.title.value"}]}}]},"viz_OptoZBwz":{"type":"splunk.table","title":"Dashboards Without Description","dataSources":{"primary":"ds_tmeJlNpK"},"eventHandlers":[{"type":"drilldown.linkToDashboard","options":{"app":"lame_documentation","dashboard":"about_this_dashboard","newTab":true,"tokens":[{"token":"id","value":"row.title.value"}]}}]}},"dataSources":{"ds_9yxIC6mW":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views
| search eai:acl.app=* AND author IN ("$user$")
"},"name":"All Dashboards"},"ds_xMTSDOeg":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_yv6Jw7F9","query":"| stats count by author
| sort count"},"name":"All Users"},"ds_dDqwzGi2":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_9yxIC6mW","query":"| rename eai:data as appData
| eval isCompliant = case(match(appData, "helpbanner"), "yes", 1=1, "no")
| table appData, isCompliant sources, urlField eai:acl.app eai:acl.owner details, mitre, usecase
| stats count by isCompliant"},"name":"Banner Compliance"},"ds_FabYWQrE":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"| lookup dashboard_details.csv id as id output details, mitre, usecase
| fillnull value="TBD" usecase, mitre, details
| eval isCompliant = case(details="TBD", "no", 1=1, "yes")
| stats count by isCompliant","extend":"ds_9yxIC6mW"},"name":"Compliant With Description"},"ds_7zm4g0Ai":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_yv6Jw7F9","query":"| stats count by author
| sort count"},"name":"Users"},"ds_CnSLL1db":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"query":"| rename eai:data as appData
| eval isCompliant = case(match(appData, "helpbanner"), "yes", 1=1, "no")
| search isCompliant = "no"
| rename eai:acl.app as app
| rename eai:acl.owner as owner
| table title app owner details, mitre, usecase
| sort owner","extend":"ds_9yxIC6mW"},"name":"Table Without Banner"},"ds_tmeJlNpK":{"type":"ds.chain","options":{"extend":"ds_9yxIC6mW","query":"| lookup dashboard_details.csv id as id output details, mitre, usecase
| fillnull value="TBD" usecase, mitre, details
| eval isCompliant = case(details="TBD", "no", 1=1, "yes")
| search isCompliant = "no"
| rename eai:acl.app as app
| rename eai:acl.owner as owner
| table title app owner details, mitre, usecase
| sort owner"},"name":"Table Without Description"},"ds_yv6Jw7F9":{"type":"ds.search","options":{"query":"| rest splunk_server=local /servicesNS/-/-/data/ui/views
| search eai:acl.app=* AND author!="nobody""},"name":"All Dashboards Slow"}},"defaults":{"dataSources":{"ds.search":{"options":{"queryParameters":{"latest":"$global_time.latest$","earliest":"$global_time.earliest$"}}}}},"inputs":{"input_global_trp":{"type":"input.timerange","options":{"token":"global_time","defaultValue":"-24h@h,now"},"title":"Global Time Range"}},"layout":{"type":"absolute","options":{"display":"auto-scale","height":1200},"structure":[{"item":"viz_Q1B0WgjB","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":0,"w":300,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_GrDdPZ2a","type":"block","position":{"x":310,"y":0,"w":300,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_2IpcmZKQ","type":"block","position":{"x":620,"y":0,"w":300,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_vP681bAk","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":320,"w":920,"h":300}},{"item":"viz_OptoZBwz","type":"block","position":{"x":0,"y":640,"w":920,"h":300}}],"globalInputs":["input_global_trp"]},"description":"Check which dashboards are compliant with company guidelines","title":"Audit Dashboards"}
